titleStmt.title: Church-Levellers, or, Vanity of vanities and certainty of delusion: discovered in the pamphlet, called The vanity of the present churches, and uncertainty of their preaching. / By a friend to both true churches and preachers.
titleStmt.author: Friend to both true churches and preachers.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A.M. for Tho. Underhill at the Bible in Wood-street,

notesStmt.note: In response to: Walwyn, William. The vanitie of the present churches.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
